select.isEqual: select zh.jgdh, jg.jgmc, zh.zhdh, zh.zhhm, round(zh.zhye,2) zhye, zh.khrq, zh.kmh, bz.bzzwmc, coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx from dxgx_yjsp_ck sp inner join jxdx_ckzh zh on zh.jxdxdh=sp.jxdxdh AND ((sp.spzt ='0' AND sp.spjg = '0' AND sp.xrbz = '0') OR (sp.spzt = '1' AND sp.spjg = '1' AND sp.xrbz = '0')) INNER JOIN khdx_jg jg ON jg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx=1 WHERE zh.khrq BETWEEN $qsrq$ AND $jsrq$ AND zh.zhye>$zhye$ and zh.jgdh = '$jgdh$'
